description:
[img]/art/image/spawn.jpg[/img]
Walking mode is fun. And as we all know, the spawning of them is exempt from the Event Que system, which means that each Spawn of them causes a small lag.

It looks like that you are having fun spawning your snowman over and over again. This is annoying to most players, if you continue doing so, you may be kicked.
name: You're a Snowman Spammer
